name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Ardenvale Paladin
oracle_text: Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, Ardenvale Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "Even when hope is but a small flame fighting the night, I will serve the absent king."

name: Ardenvale Tactician // Dizzying Swoop

card_faces.name: Ardenvale Tactician
card_faces.oracle_text: Flying
card_faces.flavor_text: In a castle that prizes loyalty above all, the bond between knight and griffin is unmatched.

card_faces.name: Dizzying Swoop
card_faces.oracle_text: Tap up to two target creatures. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

flavor_text: In a castle that prizes loyalty above all, the bond between knight and griffin is unmatched.

name: Bake into a Pie
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

name: Barge In
oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each attacking non-Human creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.

name: Barrow Witches
oracle_text: When Barrow Witches enters the battlefield, return target Knight card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Taste the sweetness, breath for breath. Keep the balance, death for death."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Bartered Cow
oracle_text: When Bartered Cow dies or when you discard it, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text: At the market, no one heeded Hilda's frantic mooing. The fae curse was turning out even worse than she had feared.

name: Beloved Princess
oracle_text:
Lifelink
Beloved Princess can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor_text: Sometimes a gentle slipper can travel where an armored boot's been denied.

name: Bloodhaze Wolverine
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Bloodhaze Wolverine gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Build a moat. If we're lucky, it can't swim."
—Syr Branigan, knight of Ardenvale

name: Blow Your House Down
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Destroy any of them that are Walls.
flavor_text:

My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds."

Defender, reach

flavor_text:

When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Wishful Merfolk
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.
flavor_text: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.

name: Witching Well
oracle_text:
When Witching Well enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{3}{U}, Sacrifice Witching Well: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.

name: Witch's Cottage
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B}.)
Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Swamps.
When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Wolf's Quarry
oracle_text: Create three 1/1 green Boar creature tokens with "When this creature dies, create a Food token." (A Food token is an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text:
"The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Youthful Knight
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text:
"In the wilds, your true training will begin."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
